title: Position a Block
description: Build on the starter program that displays a short introduction of a character you make up. The introduction to your character should speak their name and one fact about them.
hint: Work with the existing program by adding one block and editing the blocks in your program. To do this, move the block from the tray to the block editor. Next, position the block between the two output blocks already in the editor. Then change the text so that the character name and one important fact about them is spoken after you press run (CTRL + SHIFT + R).
